mapper.select: select x.coin_ticker, x.coin_kor_name, x.coin_eng_name, y.datetime_kst , case when position('.0' in y.c_price) > (char_length(y.c_price)-2) then replace(y.c_price, '.0', '') else c_price end c_price from bithumb_coin_info x , (select y.coin_ticker, max(y.datetime_kst) datetime_kst , (select cast(z.c_price as varchar) from bithumb_coin_min z where y.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and max(y.datetime_kst) = z.datetime_kst) c_price from bithumb_coin_min y group by y.coin_ticker) y where x.coin_delete_yn = 'N' and x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker order by cast(y.c_price as numeric) desc
select yyyymmdd, 'D' as type, yyyymmdd as start_date, yyyymmdd as end_date from bithumb_coin_report_daily where delete_yn = 'N' group by yyyymmdd order by yyyymmdd desc

select x.yyyymmdd, x.coin_ticker, y.coin_kor_name, (y.coin_kor_name || ' [' || y.coin_ticker || ']') coin_title, x.ranking, x.status , x.o_price, x.l_price, x.h_price, x.c_price , x.o_c_price, x.o_c_price_rate, x.l_h_price, x.l_h_price_rate, x.real_l_h_price, x.real_l_h_price_rate , x.lower_price_time, x.higher_price_time, x.lower_volume_time, x.higher_volume_time , x.o_0_4, x.l_0_4, x.h_0_4, x.c_0_4, x.v_0_4 , x.o_4_8, x.l_4_8, x.h_4_8, x.c_4_8, x.v_4_8 , x.o_8_12, x.l_8_12, x.h_8_12, x.c_8_12, x.v_8_12 , x.o_12_16, x.l_12_16, x.h_12_16, x.c_12_16, x.v_12_16 , x.o_16_20, x.l_16_20, x.h_16_20, x.c_16_20, x.v_16_20 , x.o_20_24, x.l_20_24, x.h_20_24, x.c_20_24, x.v_20_24 , x.complete_yn, x.delete_yn , coalesce((select ranking from bithumb_coin_report_daily z where x.coin_ticker=z.coin_ticker and yyyymmdd = #{yesterday}), '') yesterday_ranking , coalesce((select o_c_price_rate from bithumb_coin_report_daily z where x.coin_ticker=z.coin_ticker and yyyymmdd = #{yesterday}), '0.0') yesterday_o_c_price_rate from bithumb_coin_report_daily x, bithumb_coin_info y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and x.delete_yn = 'N' and y.coin_delete_yn = 'N' and x.yyyymmdd = #{date} and x.o_price is not null and x.l_price is not null and x.h_price is not null and x.c_price is not null order by case when x.coin_ticker = 'BTC' then 0 else cast(x.ranking as integer) end
select x.yyyymmdd, x.id, x.row, x.col, coalesce(x.html, '') html from bithumb_coin_report_daily_html x where x.yyyymmdd = #{date} and x.diff_yn = 'Y' order by cast(x.row as integer)

lower_price_time, higher_price_time, lower_volume_time, higher_volume_time, create_datetime , o_0_4, l_0_4, h_0_4, c_0_4, v_0_4, o_4_8, l_4_8, h_4_8, c_4_8, v_4_8, o_8_12, l_8_12, h_8_12, c_8_12, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') , x.o_price_0_4, x.l_price_0_4, x.h_price_0_4, x.c_price_0_4, x.trade_volume_0_4 , x.o_price_4_8, x.l_price_4_8, x.h_price_4_8, x.c_price_4_8, x.trade_volume_4_8 , x.o_price_8_12, x.l_price_8_12, x.h_price_8_12, x.c_price_8_12, x.trade_volume_8_12 , x.o_price_12_16, x.l_price_12_16, x.h_price_12_16, x.c_price_12_16, x.trade_volume_12_16 , x.o_price_16_20, x.o_price, x.c_price, x.l_price, x.h_price, '기준' AS ranking , case when cast(x.c_price as numeric) > cast(x.o_price as numeric) then '상승' when cast(x.c_price as numeric) < cast(x.o_price as numeric) then '하락' else '보합' end status , cast((cast(x.c_price as numeric) - cast(x.o_price as numeric)) as varchar) o_c_price , cast((ROUND(((cast(x.c_price as numeric)-cast(x.o_price as numeric))/cast(x.o_price as numeric))*100,2)) as varchar) o_c_price_rate , cast((cast(x.h_price as numeric) - cast(x.l_price as numeric)) as varchar) l_h_price , cast((ROUND(((cast(x.h_price as numeric)-cast(x.l_price as numeric))/cast(x.l_price as numeric))*100,2)) as varchar) l_h_price_rate , x.lower_time, x.higher_time, x.volum_low_time, x.volum_high_time , x.o_price_0_4, x.l_price_0_4, x.h_price_0_4, x.c_price_0_4, x.trade_volume_0_4 , x.o_price_4_8, x.l_price_4_8, x.h_price_4_8, x.c_price_4_8, x.trade_volume_4_8 , x.o_price_8_12, x.l_price_8_12, x.h_price_8_12, x.c_price_8_12, x.trade_volume_8_12 , x.o_price_12_16, x.l_price_12_16, x.h_price_12_16, x.c_price_12_16, x.trade_volume_12_16 , x.o_price_16_20, x.l_price_16_20, x.h_price_16_20, x.c_price_16_20, x.trade_volume_16_20 , x.o_price_20_24, x.l_price_20_24, x.h_price_20_24, x.c_price_20_24, x.trade_volume_20_24 from ( select x.coin_ticker , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(m.o_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(m.o_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(m.o_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(m.o_price as numeric) as varchar) end from bithumb_coin_min m where x.coin_ticker = m.coin_ticker and left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by m.datetime_kst asc limit 1) o_price , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(m.c_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(m.c_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(m.c_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(m.l_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(m.l_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(m.l_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(m.l_price as numeric) as varchar) end from bithumb_coin_min m where x.coin_ticker = m.coin_ticker and left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(m.l_price as left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(m.h_price as numeric) desc limit 1) h_price , (select substring(m.datetime_kst, 12, 5) from bithumb_coin_min m where x.coin_ticker = m.coin_ticker and left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(m.l_price as numeric) limit 1) lower_time , (select substring(m.datetime_kst, 12, 5) from bithumb_coin_min m where x.coin_ticker = m.coin_ticker and left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(m.h_price as numeric) desc limit 1) higher_time , (select cast(cast(substring(m.datetime_kst, 12, 2) as integer) as varchar)||'시' from bithumb_coin_min m where x.coin_ticker = m.coin_ticker and left(m.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} group by substring(m.datetime_kst, 12, 2) order by sum(cast(m.trade_volume as numeric)) asc limit 1) volum_low_time , insert into bithumb_coin_report_daily_html (yyyymmdd, id, row, col, html, diff_yn, blog_yn, create_datetime) values (#{yyyymmdd}, #{id}, #{row}, #{col}, #{html}, #{diff_yn}, #{blog_yn}, to_char(now(), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select cast(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cast(x.o_c_price_rate as numeric) desc) as varchar) AS ranking , x.datetime_kst, x.coin_ticker, x.coin_kor_name, x.o_price, x.c_price, x.o_c_price_rate from ( select x.datetime_kst, x.coin_ticker, x.coin_kor_name, x.oo_price o_price, x.cc_price c_price , cast((ROUND(((cast(x.cc_price as numeric)-cast(x.oo_price as numeric))/cast(x.oo_price as numeric))*100,1)) as varchar) o_c_price_rate from ( select x.datetime_kst, x.coin_ticker , (select a.coin_kor_name from bithumb_coin_info a where a.coin_ticker = x.coin_ticker) coin_kor_name , (select a.o_price from bithumb_coin_min a where a.coin_ticker = x.coin_ticker and a.datetime_kst ilike '${search_date}%' order by a.datetime_kst asc limit 1) oo_price , (select a.c_price from bithumb_coin_min a where a.coin_ticker = x.coin_ticker order by a.datetime_kst desc limit 1) cc_price from bithumb_coin_min x , (select coin_ticker, max(datetime_kst) recently_datetime_kst from bithumb_coin_min where datetime_kst ilike '${search_date}%' group by coin_ticker) y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and x.datetime_kst = y.recently_datetime_kst ) x ) x order by cast(x.o_c_price_rate as numeric) desc

select cast((sum((select count(*) from bithumb_coin_day y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and x.datetime_kst= y.datetime_kst))) as varchar) total_count , cast((sum((select count(*) from bithumb_coin_day y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and cast(x.o_price as numeric) < cast(x.c_price as numeric) and x.datetime_kst= y.datetime_kst))) as varchar) increase_count , cast((sum((select count(*) from bithumb_coin_day y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and cast(x.o_price as numeric) > cast(x.c_price as numeric) and x.datetime_kst= y.datetime_kst))) as varchar) degradation_count , cast((sum((select count(*) from bithumb_coin_day y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and cast(x.o_price as numeric) = cast(x.c_price as numeric) and x.datetime_kst= y.datetime_kst))) as varchar) flat_count , coalesce((select array_to_string(array_agg(y.coin_ticker), ', ') from (select * from bithumb_coin_day order by coin_ticker) y where cast(y.o_price as numeric) < cast(y.c_price as numeric) and left(y.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date}), '') increase_ticker , coalesce((select array_to_string(array_agg(y.coin_ticker), ', ') from (select * from bithumb_coin_day order by coin_ticker) y where cast(y.o_price as numeric) > cast(y.c_price as numeric) and left(y.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date}), '') degradation_ticker , coalesce((select array_to_string(array_agg(y.coin_ticker), ', ') from (select * from bithumb_coin_day order by coin_ticker) y where cast(y.o_price as numeric) = cast(y.c_price as numeric) and left(y.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date}), '') flat_ticker from bithumb_coin_day x where left(x.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date}

select x.coin_ticker, x.coin_kor_name, x.coin_eng_name, x.o_price, x.c_price, x.l_price, x.h_price , substring(cast((cast(replace(x.coin_price_min_time,'T',' ') as timestamp)) as varchar), 12, 5) coin_price_min_time , substring(cast((cast(replace(x.coin_price_max_time,'T',' ') as timestamp)) as varchar), 12, 5) coin_price_max_time , substring(cast((cast((replace(x.coin_volume_min_time,'T',' ')||':00:00') as timestamp)) as varchar), 12, 2) coin_volume_min_time , substring(cast((cast((replace(x.coin_volume_max_time,'T',' ')||':00:00') as timestamp)) as varchar), 12, 2) coin_volume_max_time , cast((ROUND(((cast(x.c_price as numeric)-cast(x.o_price as numeric))/cast(x.o_price as numeric))*100,1)) as varchar) open_close_rate , cast((cast(x.c_price as numeric)-cast(x.o_price as numeric)) as varchar) open_close_calc , cast(ROUND(((((cast(x.max_price as numeric) - cast(x.min_price as numeric))/ cast(x.min_price as numeric))) * 100), 1) as varchar) lowest_highest_fluctuation , cast((cast(x.max_price as numeric)-cast(x.min_price as numeric)) as varchar) lowest_highest_calc from ( select x.coin_ticker, y.coin_kor_name, y.coin_eng_name , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar) end min_price from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(z.l_price as numeric) limit 1) min_price , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar) end max_price from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(z.h_price as numeric) desc limit 1) max_price , (select case when position('.0' in z.c_price) > (char_length(z.c_price)-2) then replace(z.c_price, '.0', '') else z.c_price end from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by z.datetime_kst desc limit 1) c_price , (select case when position('.0' in z.o_price) > (char_length(z.o_price)-2) then replace(z.o_price, '.0', '') else z.o_price end from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by z.datetime_kst asc limit 1) o_price , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar) end from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(z.l_price as numeric) limit 1) l_price , (select case when position('.0' in cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar)) > (char_length(cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar))-2) then replace((cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar)), '.0', '') else cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar) end from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} order by cast(z.h_price as numeric) desc limit 1) h_price , (select substring(z.datetime_kst, 0, 14) from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} group by substring(z.datetime_kst, 0, 14) order by sum(cast(z.trade_volume as numeric)) desc limit 1) coin_volume_max_time , (select substring(z.datetime_kst, 0, 14) from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} group by substring(z.datetime_kst, 0, 14) order by sum(cast(z.trade_volume as numeric)) asc limit 1) coin_volume_min_time , (select z.datetime_kst from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} and cast(cast(z.l_price as numeric) as varchar) = cast(min(cast(x.l_price as numeric)) as varchar) order by z.datetime_kst limit 1) coin_price_min_time , (select z.datetime_kst from bithumb_coin_min z where x.coin_ticker = z.coin_ticker and left(z.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} and cast(cast(z.h_price as numeric) as varchar) = cast(max(cast(x.h_price as numeric)) as varchar) order by z.datetime_kst limit 1) coin_price_max_time from bithumb_coin_min x, bithumb_coin_info y where x.coin_ticker = y.coin_ticker and left(x.datetime_kst, 10) = #{date} group by x.coin_ticker, y.coin_kor_name, y.coin_eng_name ) x where ((x.coin_price_min_time <= x.coin_price_max_time and x.coin_ticker != 'BTC') or (x.coin_ticker = 'BTC')) order by case x.coin_ticker when 'BTC' then 0 else 1 end , ((ROUND(((cast(x.c_price as numeric)-cast(x.o_price as numeric))/cast(x.o_price as numeric))*100,1))+ROUND(((((cast(x.max_price as numeric) - cast(x.min_price as numeric))/ cast(x.min_price as numeric))) * 100), 1)) desc limit 4

select replace(x.datetime_kst, ' 00:00:00', '') datetime_kst, x.o_c_price_rate , case when position('.0' in x.o_price) > (char_length(x.o_price)-2) then replace(x.o_price, '.0', '') else x.o_price end o_price , case when position('.0' in x.c_price) > (char_length(x.c_price)-2) then replace(x.c_price, '.0', '') else x.c_price end c_price , case when position('.0' in x.l_price) > (char_length(x.l_price)-2) then replace(x.l_price, '.0', '') else x.l_price end l_price , case when position('.0' in x.h_price) > (char_length(x.h_price)-2) then replace(x.h_price, '.0', '') else x.h_price end h_price from bithumb_coin_day x where coin_ticker = #{coin_ticker} and left(x.datetime_kst, 10) >= #{std_date} and left(x.datetime_kst, 10) <= #{end_date} order by cast(x.o_c_price_rate as numeric) desc limit 7
